resources.string: Welcome to the\nCSUN Map Trivia game!
If this is your first time playing, please check the game rules

CSUN Map Trivia is an
 Android game application created at
 California State University Northridge
 as a Spring 2015 semester project by
 'Team 2' for Professor M. Boctor's
 Computer Science 680 class.
 Our team consists of:
 Chris Bowles
 Victor Perez
 Russell Templet
 Nishika Malhotra
 Maria Velasquez

 Our website can be accessed by clicking the button below, which will exit this application and open your web browser at our address.
Google Play Services APK not supported
Rules of CSUN Map Trivia Game\n

In this game you will be presented with descriptive questions about CSUN's campus 
The goal is to answer the questions as fast as possible by long pressing the correct building on the map 

Think YOU got what it takes to master CSUN Map Trivia?
